title: Animals and Shapes Books!: 2 Great Short Bedtime Stories!
description: 2 great stories for kids, read a few pages and you won't be able to stop. Check it out today and see for yourself.Bundle includes "Ms. Crow's Picnic" and "The Taste of Shapes"This is the perfect read for any child starting off reading or any reader looking for a exciting stories!
author: Betty J. Byers
